text: The Mummy Returns is a 2001 American fantasy adventure horror movie. It is a sequel to 1999's The Mummy. == Cast == * Brendan Fraser as Richard "Rick" O'Connell * Rachel Weisz as Evelyn O'Connell / Nefertiri * John Hannah as Jonathan Carnahan * Arnold Vosloo as High Priest Imhotep * Oded Fehr as Ardeth Bey * Patricia Vel√°squez as Meela Nais / Anck-Su-Namun * Dwayne Johnson as The Scorpion King * Jonathan Hyde as Dr. Allen Chamberlain == References == == Other websites == * Official site * Category:2001 adventure movies Category:2001 fantasy movies Category:2001 horror movies Category:American adventure movies Category:2000s American fantasy movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies directed by Stephen Sommers Category:Movies set in Egypt Category:Movies set in deserts Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies about treasure hunting Category:Movies about resurrection Category:Movies about abduction Category:Multilingual movies Category:The Mummy Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Screenplays by Stephen Sommers Category:Movies composed by Alan Silvestri Category:2000s monster movies
title: The Mummy Returns
